bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: The icon of the desktop icon now is too small. While in the upstream source larger graphics are included, also a salable one /usr/share/keepassx2/icons/application/scalable/apps/keepassx.svgz
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): keepassx-2.0.3-1.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible: Open de gnome-shell activities and type in 'keepass'. You'll see an icon that's noticeably pixelated compared to the other icons.

It would be nice if all the icons can be installed to /usr/share/icons/hicolor which are provided by the package (/usr/share/keepassx2/icons/application/{128x128, 16x16,22x22,24x24,256x256,32x32,48x48,64x64,scalable}). On a full-hd display the default icon (/usr/share/icons/hicolor/32x32/apps/keepassx2.png) is really pixelated.

(In reply to Kees de Jong from comment #0) > Description of problem: The icon of the desktop icon now is too small. While > in the upstream source larger graphics are included, also a salable one > /usr/share/keepassx2/icons/application/scalable/apps/keepassx.svgz > > > Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): > keepassx-2.0.3-1.fc25.x86_64 > > > How reproducible: Open de gnome-shell activities and type in 'keepass'. > You'll see an icon that's noticeably pixelated compared to the other icons.
Until the icons are copied over while installation of keepassx2 you can do something like this:
cp /usr/share/applications/keepassx2.desktop $HOME/.local/share/applications/
and change the line 'Icon=keepassx2' to 'Icon=keepassx' in the $HOME/.local/share/applications/keepassx2.desktop.
keepassx-2.0.3-2.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-fd322954e0
I just installed the new build package. The icons are sharp now. Thank you very much.

keepassx-2.0.3-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-fd322954e0
keepassx-2.0.3-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
